name: Turtles All the Way Down (applecore555, jonmerrin, nazliuzgur)
name_original: Turtles All the Way Down (applecore555, jonmerrin, nazliuzgur)
description:
A game about turtles winning a race against a hare by working together in an unusual way.  

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys (or A-D): Move side to side
  • Space (or Up/W): Jump
  • Split Apart: LMB (Mouse to Aim)
  • Pause: Esc

There are 6 levels, thanks so much for playing!
